description:
The Horus Heresy and by extension Legions Imperialis, has the same problem that Lord of the Rings suffers from. That's all changing with the Dark Mechanicum models, whilst not true Dark Mechanicum models, you can take Karacnos Tanks as part of the Horus aligned Mechanicus. Find why I take issue with games from the 31st Millennium in today's post.

The post Showcase: Legions Imperialis Karacnos Assault Tanks (inc. painting guide) appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Legions Imperialis Karacnos Assault Tanks (inc. painting guide)
